hidden states.from sentence: The main training details are as follows : the dimension of the hidden states of LSTMs and word embeddings are 300 .

word embeddings.from sentence: The word embeddings are initialized by 300D GloVe 840B , and out - of - vocabulary words among them are initialized randomly .

Adam ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ).from sentence: Adam ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ) is used for optimization with an initial learning rate of 0.0004 .

mini - batch size.from sentence: The mini - batch size is set to 32 .
